name: Lodge name
description_ph: Briefly describe your lodge and its features
pricePerNight_tt: The price must be in euros
dropZone: Drag and drop images here or use the button below to select them
errorEmptyFields: Please fill in all required fields. Make sure you've entered an email, phone number, number of rooms, price, check-in and check-out dates and the main image
errorEmail: The email entered is invalid. Please ensure it has the correct format (e.g., example@domain.com)
errorPhone: The phone number must contain exactly 9 numeric digits. Please verify your number and try again
errorRooms: The number of rooms must be a positive integer greater than 0. Please enter a valid number of rooms
errorPrice: The price per night must be a positive numeric value. Please ensure you enter a valid price
